Name: Pink Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: The quality of the pomegranate syrup will make or break this delicate Daiquiri .
History: A classic from the 1930s that's more formally known as the Daiquiri No. 5 .
Nutrition: One serving of Pink Daiquiri contains 189 calories
